body.name: Bellivera Women's Puffer Jacket Faux Leather Bubble Padding Sherpa-Lined Coat with Removable Fur Collar
features: Care instructions Machine Wash; Hand Wash

Trendy and Chic Exterior: Our puffer coat boast a stylish faux leather shell that exudes a trendy and chic vibe. Winter jackets for women feature an adjustable waist belt that allows you to tailor the fit to your liking, accentuating your waistline and creating a flattering silhouette that exudes confidence and style. ensuring you stand out with fashion-forward flair

Soft Sherpa Lining: Womens coats step into a world of unparalleled comfort with our outerwear plush fleece lining, enveloping you in a cloud of softness while ensuring optimal warmth during the cold spring days

Mid-length Silhouette: Designed to flatter your figure, our mid-length down alternative overcoat not only makes you look slim and tall but also offers versatile styling options for a wide range of occasions, from casual outings to formal events

Secure Storage: Stay organized and keep your essentials close at hand with the convenient side pockets, providing a safe and easily accessible storage solution for your phone, keys, and other small belongings

Removable Faux Fur Trim: For an added touch of versatility and style, our jacket come with a detachable faux fur collar. You can easily remove or attach the collar according to your preference, allowing you to switch up your look and adapt to different weather conditions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Northern Ladies Recommendation 10/10!
reviews.reviewText: I’m going to preface my review by saying that I live in Wisconsin (you know, right below Canada and neighbors to Minnesota and Illinois. The ice gets ice here in the winters. If anyone knows cold weather jackets to recommend it would be me and my Midwest/Northern girls. I love this coat. Not only did it keep me warm on a December night out in Chicago, but I have quickly made it my favorite, most worn coat. It is lightweight, has a different texture to the outside shell that is neat, it’s figure flattering with a belt to cinch in at the waist, folds well for travel and takes up minimal space (I fly for a living), stylish, easy to move in AND keeps me warm! It’s difficult to check all of those boxes!I really can’t say anything bad about it. Be aware that the front does go down low. I tried to include a picture of that. There is a zipper and snap overlay for securing the coat. You may want to add a scarf if the faux fur neckline isn’t warm enough for you. I’ve had no issues yet. I have noticed that when I am wearing certain fabrics that are sweater like material, I end up having some shedding from the faux fur transfer. It’s easy to remove but be aware- don’t wear it with a white shirt until after it’s done shedding.Also, I normally wear a small/medium in tops and an 8/10 in pants. I’m 5’6.5” tall and around 160 lbs. My other coats are normally medium. I did order a large in this one and I’m glad I did. I feel like I’ll have a nice amount of room to wear layers or thicker sweaters and not feel restricted. It also accommodates my hips and thighs nicely. I could’ve gotten away with a medium but I think L was the best choice in the end.My ONLY complaint is that I can’t buy a different faux fur collar separately! I will be purchasing a second coat in a different color with a tan collar so I can interchange! That makes it 4 coats for the price of one. It’s also on sale with 20% off right now. Get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, warm coat
reviews.reviewText: I already have another coat of this brand. I was looking for something warm, for outside in Indiana for my outside sales role. I love fur. I have a puffy coat but it's not too warm. This one is awesome. It's great to wear to work or take the dog out. I was dyeing my hair when the coat arrived so that explains my hair in the Pic. Anyway, the fur is so soft and nice. The material is nice and feels almost like fake leather or something on the outside. You can cinch the belt and overlap the material for a slimmer work. The coat has a zipper and snaps. Ordering it without trying it on was scary, but it really worked out. It came nicely packaged Ina fancy little zip bag. I really love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely coat. All in all it fits true to size and is deliciously warm with the fuzzy lining. Not so sure about "leather" look. It is a coated nylon not pu leather. The zipper is a little sticky hence the 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made! Comfy, soft, love the fur.
reviews.reviewText: This coat is a must for the winter. Keeps me warm. The fur is soft & beautiful. Doesn't scratch. You can also remove the fur collar which would leave you with a regular collar. It is a V-neck so you can wear a nice scarf or wear as is...without a choker neck feeling.I'm 5'4" 150 lbs I got a Large. I can wear sweatshirts underneath & still feel comfortable.You can tie the belt or leave it hanging. Either way is cute. It has both zipper and snap closures....no issues zipping up or down & snaps stay in place.Let's talk about inside: the top half is soft and cozy like you're wearing a comfy blanket, but not too thick. The bottom half is soft and comfy. Love the pattern.Looks and feels great. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very good for the price . Looks nice and warm and the collar is detachable . I did not like the brown color it’s a weird brown unfortunatelly looks worst in person so will have to return . I am 5’4 and it’s above knee high if you are tall and looking for something longer this might not be it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best casual dressy and warmest coat. I love it. It's perfect for the season

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful BUT Disappointing
reviews.reviewText: This is a BEAUTIFUL coat. The fur is soft and great quality. The inside velvet is just as nice. According to the size chart I should purchase a XL. I wanted a little extra room and never have luck with size charts so I ordered a XXXL. I knew by the package on the porch this was not going to fit. This jacket is small. It looks like a medium. I couldn't even get my arms into this coat. It will be returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this beautiful coat on Black Friday and absolutely loved it. (it was a gift to my daughter and she said she loved it but..) It was too small in the shoulders so sent back for a larger size and they sent a different coat. The one in the picture, long length, was not the one we received. They sent a short coat that was too big and ...short. At the hips short. The first one came to the knee. Told my daughter to return it but it's the only one she has so she is going to keep it as we went through the blizzard with a ton of snow and sub zero tempsVery disappointed and would not buy again. There were other problems with this purchase but I have reviewed what I think is most relevant. Fit tight in shoulders but otherwise was a good fit,beautiful coat, size up for overall decent fit. Long length one is a very nice coat.

Love this winter coat. Heavy and great quality coat. Has pockets and removable fur. Like that it goes to just above the knee. 5' 4 " in height and i ordered the small , but based on reviews i would have been told to go with medium. If i re ordered would probably go with x-small as coat is roomy. I am still very satisfied. Have extra room for big bulky sweaters underneath. Beautiful quality coat for an amazing price! I would definitely buy the black coat next.
It's more brown than pink but other than that it's beautiful, warm, and fits like a glove.

Sehr schöne Jacke, gute Verarbeitung, gute Passform, mit 1,68m und 64 kg Größe M bestellt., perfekt.Jacke ist recht warm, also auch für kalte Wintertage geeignet.Leider hatte die Jacke einen kleinen Materialfehler an einer sichbaren Stelle.Deshalb musste ich sie zurück schicken. Rücksendung völlig problemlos, Geld sofort da.Wollte sie mir gleich noch einmal bestellen, leider vergriffen. Schade!
Cette veste est super agréable à porter et réchauffe très bien... Aucun regret de mon achat.
